entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
